title: How to download previous year ESA question papers from pesu library's website? I'm in first sem, and they haven't provided credentials to login

comments.body: The password by default is always `pesit`. The username is either your SRN or PRN (I don't remember which)
Check your email...we did receive credentials to access the online resources

Once you get your credentials, or you can use 

username: your\_srn, password: pesit, like the other redditor said. 

1. log on to [http://www.library.pes.edu/opac/default.aspx](http://www.library.pes.edu/opac/default.aspx) with those creds
2. go to the **"Search"** tab on the top horizontal bar
3. In the **"Category"** section, switch to **"Digital Library"**. Do not forget to do this step as this will be helpful to filter out only ESA papers
4. in the **Title** section, give in the course name. Usually with this you get all papers. but you may also get with your course code. Just remove the UEYY part and give in only whats after that. eg: CS345/MA201 etc. 
5. Hit "**Search**", and youll get a bunch of results. Click on "**Download**" to get a link to a pdf. save these to a notepad or something. Next time you wanna access these papers, you just have to click on these links, no need of even logging in xD
I tried using those but it still says invalid member id/password. Is it working for you?
Yeah…it didn’t work for me either…try it again, it should give you a download link
heyy, did you figure out how to login? I'm guessing you did, so could you please help me out? I'm a first year.
hey! so you can't actually login and download those esa papers on your own, you'll have to go to the library and get that done!
both SRN or PRN r not working
what is the meber id and password
they would have mailed it to u in ur pesu mail in 1st sem
